name: media
title: Media
description: Table with media files associated with a deployment (`deploymentID`). Media files can be captured by the camera trap (images/videos) or created afterwards by grouping files (sequences).

fields.name: mediaID
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the media file.

fields.name: parentMediaID
fields.description: Unique identifier of the sequence the media file belongs to. Internal foreign key to `media:mediaID`. Optional. Empty for sequences themselves.

fields.name: deploymentID
fields.description: Unique identifier of the deployment the media file belongs to. Foreign key to `deployment:deploymentID`.

fields.name: captureMethod
fields.description: Method used to capture or create the media file.

fields.name: start
fields.description: Date and time when the media file recording started, as an ISO 8601 formatted string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: end
fields.description: Date and time when the media file recorded ended, as an ISO 8601 formatted string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: filePath
fields.description: URL or relative path to the media file, respectively for externally hosted files or files that are part of the Data Package.

fields.name: fileName
fields.description: Name of the media file. If provided, one should be able to sort media chronologically within a deployment on `timestamp` (first) and `fileName` (second).

fields.name: exifData
fields.description: EXIF data of the file, as a valid JSON object.

fields.name: favourite
fields.description: `true` if media file is deemed of interest, e.g. an exemplar photo of an individual.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Comments or notes about the media file.

fields.name: _id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the media file as assigned by the data management system.
